itemDescription: English railway entrepreneur and local politician

wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Beale (4 June 1803 – 11 September 1874) was a British Liberal Party politician, banker and industrialist.

response: |align=center| 3 || Samuel Beale || || 1841 ||align=center| 1 || MP for Derby between 1857–65.

Sargant was born in London, the son of barrister and conveyancer Henry Sargant, and of Catherine Emma, daughter of Samuel Beale. Among his siblings were the painter Mary Sargant Florence and the botanist Ethel Sargant.
